With the help of the comments in the question i was able to solve the problem. The solution for me was to read byte by byte and append it together to a line like this:

linefeed="$(echo -e "\r")"
temp_line=""
while IFS= read -rn 1 char; do
    if [ "${char}" == "${linefeed}" ]; then
        line="${temp_line}"
        temp_line=""

        # DO YOUR STUFF HERE!

    else
        temp_line="${temp_line}${char}"
    fi
done < <(command --with-params)
